titlestmt.title: Collection List for the Huntington Library and Art Gallery

respstmt.name: Andrea Dickens and Christopher N. Jackson,
Andrea Dickens
Wesley Raabe
respstmt.resp: Writing XSL Templates and Designing Interface, Fall 2004

Robert Essick
respstmt.resp: Making proofreading corrections and updating XSL, Summer 2005

publicationstmt.publisher: The Huntington Library, Art Collections, and Botanical Gardens
Published by and available from the William Blake Archive, http://www.blakearchive.org

availability.p: ©2008 Morris Eaves, Robert N. Essick, Joseph Viscomi.

projectdesc.p: These collection lists were prepared for the William Blake Archive.

p.hi: None of the works in these collection lists is held at the offices of the William Blake Archive. Please contact the owning institution if you desire further information or wish to make arrangements to view any works.

div1.head: Catalog Information
div1.p: For the catalogue of the Huntington Blakes, see Robert N. Essick, The Works of William Blake in the Huntington Collections. A Complete Catalog. Huntington Library Publications, 1985.
